tool_description:
Easiest way to generate PDFs.
You can use our API with plain html or urls.
name: EasyPDF - HTML to PDF
title: EasyPDF - HTML to PDF

api_list.name: Generate PDF
api_list.description: Generate a PDF file with html data or an url
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easypdf-html-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com/pdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easypdf-html-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easypdf-html-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com/pdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easypdf-html-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
